alert.note: Alert for Burnett (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 2:21AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN PINE AND SOUTHWESTERN BURNETT COUNTIES THROUGH 245 AM CDT... At 221 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rock Creek, or near Pine City, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pine City and Grantsburg around 225 AM CDT. Branstad around 230 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
